name: Barry Fodder & the Giblets of Ire
name_original: Barry Fodder & the Giblets of Ire
description:
Simultaneously my second game jam entry and second game!  I'm hoping this one turns out a little better than my first.

Designed and developed for the "Pixel Weekend Jam #3" from March 24, 2018 to March 26, 2018.  The game was developed using Phaser3.  I created the sound effects with Chiptone by SFB Games (http://sfbgames.com/chiptone/).  I created the music with BeepBox (https://www.beepbox.co).  I was hoping to work with a buddy on the art but, alas, you're stuck with what I made in Aseprite.

The control scheme is: 

  • WASD or arrow keys move your character
  • Spacebar shoots

I (once again) had bigger plans than I could realize in a weekend.
